com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations

Class MarkerViewManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations.MarkerViewManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapView.OnMapChangedListener

    public class MarkerViewManager
extends Object
implements MapView.OnMapChangedListener
    Interface for interacting with ViewMarkers objects inside of a MapView.

    This class is responsible for managing a MarkerView item.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  MarkerViewManager.OnMarkerViewAddedListener
      Interface definition invoked when the View of a MarkerView has been added to the map.

    • Method Detail

      • bind

      • onMapChanged

        public void onMapChanged(int change)
        Description copied from interface: MapView.OnMapChangedListener
        Called when the displayed map view changes.
        Specified by:
        onMapChanged in interface MapView.OnMapChangedListener
        Parameters:
        change - Type of map change event, one of MapView.REGION_WILL_CHANGE, MapView.REGION_WILL_CHANGE_ANIMATED, MapView.REGION_IS_CHANGING, MapView.REGION_DID_CHANGE, MapView.REGION_DID_CHANGE_ANIMATED, MapView.WILL_START_LOADING_MAP, MapView.DID_FAIL_LOADING_MAP, MapView.DID_FINISH_LOADING_MAP, MapView.WILL_START_RENDERING_FRAME, MapView.DID_FINISH_RENDERING_FRAME, MapView.DID_FINISH_RENDERING_FRAME_FULLY_RENDERED, MapView.WILL_START_RENDERING_MAP, MapView.DID_FINISH_RENDERING_MAP, MapView.DID_FINISH_RENDERING_MAP_FULLY_RENDERED.

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Called to enable or disable MarkerView management.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true if management should be enabled

      • setWaitingForRenderInvoke

        public void setWaitingForRenderInvoke(boolean waitingForRenderInvoke)
        Called with true to wait for the next render invocation.
        Parameters:
        waitingForRenderInvoke - true if waiting for next render event

      • animateRotation

        public void animateRotation(@NonNull
                            MarkerView marker,
                            float rotation)
        Animate a MarkerView to a given rotation.

        The MarkerView will be rotated from its current rotation to the given rotation.

        Parameters:
        marker - the MarkerView to rotate.
        rotation - the rotation value.

      • animateRotationBy

        public void animateRotationBy(@NonNull
                              MarkerView marker,
                              float rotation)
        Animate a MarkerView with a given rotation.
        Parameters:
        marker - the MarkerView to rotate by.
        rotation - the rotation by value, limited to 0 - 360 degrees.

      • setRotation

        public void setRotation(@NonNull
                        MarkerView marker,
                        float rotation)

      • animateAlpha

        public void animateAlpha(@NonNull
                         MarkerView marker,
                         float alpha)
        Animate a MarkerView to a given alpha value.

        The MarkerView will be transformed from its current alpha value to the given value.

        Parameters:
        marker - the MarkerView to change its alpha value.
        alpha - the alpha value.

      • animateVisible

        public void animateVisible(@NonNull
                           MarkerView marker,
                           boolean visible)
        Animate a MarkerVIew to be visible or invisible

        The MarkerView will be made View.VISIBLE or View.GONE.

        Parameters:
        marker - the MarkerView to change its visibility
        visible - the flag indicating if MarkerView is visible

      • updateMarkerViewsPosition

        public void updateMarkerViewsPosition()
        Updates the position of MarkerViews currently found in the viewport.

        The collection of MarkerView will be iterated and each item position will be updated. If an item is View state is not visible and its related flag is set to visible, the MarkerView will be animated to visible using alpha animation.

      • setTilt

        public void setTilt(float tilt)
        Set tilt on every non flat MarkerView currently shown in the Viewport.
        Parameters:
        tilt - the tilt value.

      • updateIcon

        public void updateIcon(@NonNull
                       MarkerView markerView)
        Update and invalidate the MarkerView icon.
        Parameters:
        markerView - the marker view to updates.

      • deselect

        public void deselect(@NonNull
                     MarkerView marker)
        Animate a MarkerView to a deselected state.

        The MapboxMap.MarkerViewAdapter.onDeselect(MarkerView, View) will be called to execute an animation.

        Parameters:
        marker - the MarkerView to deselect.

      • deselect

        public void deselect(@NonNull
                     MarkerView marker,
                     boolean callbackToMap)
        Animate a MarkerView to a deselected state.

        The MapboxMap.MarkerViewAdapter.onDeselect(MarkerView, View) will be called to execute an animation.

        Parameters:
        marker - the MarkerView to deselect.
        callbackToMap - indicates if deselect marker must be called on MapboxMap.

      • select

        public void select(@NonNull
                   MarkerView marker)
        Animate a MarkerView to a selected state.
        Parameters:
        marker - the MarkerView object to select.

      • select

        public void select(@NonNull
                   MarkerView marker,
                   boolean callbackToMap)
        Animate a MarkerView to a selected state.
        Parameters:
        marker - the MarkerView object to select.
        callbackToMap - indicates if select marker must be called on MapboxMap.

      • select

        public void select(@NonNull
                   MarkerView marker,
                   View convertView,
                   MapboxMap.MarkerViewAdapter adapter)
        Animate a MarkerView to a selected state.

        The MapboxMap.MarkerViewAdapter.onSelect(MarkerView, View, boolean) will be called to execute an animation.

        Parameters:
        marker - the MarkerView object to select.
        convertView - the View presentation of the MarkerView.
        adapter - the adapter used to adapt the marker to the convertView.

      • select

        public void select(@NonNull
                   MarkerView marker,
                   View convertView,
                   MapboxMap.MarkerViewAdapter adapter,
                   boolean callbackToMap)
        Animate a MarkerView to a selected state.

        The MapboxMap.MarkerViewAdapter.onSelect(MarkerView, View, boolean) will be called to execute an animation.

        Parameters:
        marker - the MarkerView object to select.
        convertView - the View presentation of the MarkerView.
        adapter - the adapter used to adapt the marker to the convertView.
        callbackToMap - indicates if select marker must be called on MapboxMap.

      • getView

        @Nullable
public View getView(MarkerView marker)
        Get view representation from a MarkerView. If marker is not found in current viewport, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        marker - the marker to get the view.
        Returns:
        the Android SDK View object.

      • getViewAdapter

        @Nullable
public MapboxMap.MarkerViewAdapter getViewAdapter(MarkerView markerView)
        Get the view adapter for a marker.
        Parameters:
        markerView - the marker to get the view adapter.
        Returns:
        the MarkerView adapter.

      • removeMarkerView

        public void removeMarkerView(MarkerView marker)
        Remove a MarkerView from a map.

        The MarkerView will be removed using an alpha animation and related View will be released to the android.support.v4.util.Pools.SimplePool from the related MapboxMap.MarkerViewAdapter. It's possible to remove the MarkerView from the underlying collection if needed.

        Parameters:
        marker - the MarkerView to remove.

      • addMarkerViewAdapter

        public void addMarkerViewAdapter(MapboxMap.MarkerViewAdapter markerViewAdapter)
        Add a MarkerViewAdapter to the MarkerViewManager.

        The provided MarkerViewAdapter must supply a generic subclass of MarkerView.

        Parameters:
        markerViewAdapter - the MarkerViewAdapter to add.

      • getMarkerViewAdapters

        public List<MapboxMap.MarkerViewAdapter> getMarkerViewAdapters()
        Get all MarkerViewAdapters associated with this MarkerViewManager.
        Returns:
        a List of MarkerViewAdapters.

      • setOnMarkerViewClickListener

        public void setOnMarkerViewClickListener(@Nullable
                                         MapboxMap.OnMarkerViewClickListener listener)
        Register a callback to be invoked when this view is clicked.
        Parameters:
        listener - the callback to be invoked.

      • update

        public void update()
        Schedule that ViewMarkers found in the viewport are invalidated.

        This method is rate limited, and invalidateViewMarkersInVisibleRegion() will only be called once each 250 ms.

      • invalidateViewMarkersInVisibleRegion

        public void invalidateViewMarkersInVisibleRegion()
        Invalidate the ViewMarkers found in the viewport.

        This method will remove any markers that aren't in the viewport anymore and will add new ones for each found Marker in the changed viewport.

      • ensureInfoWindowOffset

        public void ensureInfoWindowOffset(MarkerView marker)
        Handles the MarkerView's info window offset.
        Parameters:
        marker - that we are ensuring info window offset.

      • getMarkerViewContainer

        public ViewGroup getMarkerViewContainer()

      • addOnMarkerViewAddedListener

        public void addOnMarkerViewAddedListener(MarkerView markerView,
                                         MarkerViewManager.OnMarkerViewAddedListener onMarkerViewAddedListener)
